pwa.addHomeDesc: Add from browser to launch instantly like an app

features.desc: AI-powered hybrid recommendation system finds the perfect movies for you
features.timeBasedDesc: Enter your travel time and get movie combinations that fit perfectly
features.aiDesc: Two AI hybrid systems understand your taste and find customized movies
features.ottDesc: Only shows movies available to watch on your subscribed OTT platforms
features.dualDesc: Get both personalized and popular recommendations for wider choices

faq.title: FAQ
faq.desc: Find answers to your questions about MovieSir
faq.a1: Yes, MovieSir is completely free! Just sign up and enjoy all features without limits
faq.a2: We currently support Netflix, Tving, Watcha, Disney+, Apple TV+ and more
faq.q3: Do I need to install an app?
faq.a3: No! MovieSir is built as a PWA, so you can use it directly in your browser
faq.q4: How does the recommendation algorithm work?
faq.a4: We use a hybrid system combining SBERT and LightGCN for optimal recommendations
